title: Shovel Knight (1.1 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here Shovel Knight. Also before you update to  this version. Back up your saves. You can find your saves at C:Users<your user name>AppDataRoamingYacht Club GamesShovel Knight. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.

------------------------
